name: Jetman (itch)
description:
Build your rocket, add some fuel and escape to the next planet. Dodge the meteors for as long as you can and get the High Score.

Controls are A, W, S, D or a joystick if attached.

Built as an Unity learning experience and inspired by the original ZX Spectrum game.

Source code now on github, together with Windows download.

Credits:

Game assets by Kenney - Space Shooter Extension.

Images and sounds from NASA.

Menu music by SnappedBuckle.
